column1: '''Mythcon 30''' was the thirtieth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.
* '''Theme:''' Bree &  Beyond: Exploring the Fantasy Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien and His Fellow Travelers
* '''Guest of Honors:''' Sylvia Hunnewell (fantasy artist), S. Gary Hunnewell (Tolkien scholar), and [[Douglas A. Anderson]] (Tolkien and fantasy scholar)
***[http://www.mythsoc.org/mc30rptbp.html Mythcon XXX: Mordor with Mosquitos] by Berni Phillips
